snippet: Metropolitan Diary: A longtime barbershop customer got a haircut from a barber he usually avoided, and was at first bored, but then amused, by the barber’s monologue.
abstract: Metropolitan Diary: A longtime barbershop customer got a haircut from a barber he usually avoided, and was at first bored, but then amused, by the barber’s monologue.

headline.main: An Earful From a Barber in Queens
